original_title: BTS MAP OF THE SOUL: 7 ~The Journey~
overview: A collection of videos that were part of BTS' album "MAP OF THE SOUL: 7 ~The Journey~" in the limited editions A and C as Blu-ray/DVD. It contains the videos "Stay Gold Music Video", "On Music Video", "Black Swan Music Video", "Lights Music Video", "Idol Music Video", "Airplane Pt. 2 Music Video" (Japanese ver.), "Fake Love Music Video", "Stay Gold Making of Music Video" and "Making of Jacket Photos".
title: BTS MAP OF THE SOUL: 7 ~The Journey~
